familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president/member of Trump Marks Fine Foods LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company holds a license deal with Two Rivers Coffee.

Former president/director/chairman of Trump Marks Fine Foods Member Corp, in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.business: Trump Marks Fine Foods Member Corp.

conflictDescription: TEST DESCRIPTION FOR THE CONFLICT (Friendly Name): Trump Marks Fine Foods
